CHAT.comment: KENTUCKY RETIREMENT SYSTEMS, ET AL., Petitioners v. EQUAL EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITY COMMISSION.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:09 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT D. KLAUSNER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MALCOLM L. STEWART ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT D. KLAUSNER, ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:07 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
